unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Experimental $P$-Value
question_text: An experiment tests the following: $H_0: \mu = 17$ vs. $H_a: \mu \neq 17$ The standard normal curve is used to find the $p$ -value when the test statistic is $z = 1.71$ . What is the $p$ -value of the experiment?
